base.name: Authorization Center
base.description: Provide secure third-party authorization services and complete information management

info.title: What can we do？
info.subTitle1Info: Designed according to the most popular OAuth2 open authorization protocol at the moment, provides secure and reliable authentication and authorization processes for web and mobile applications.
info.subTitle2Info: Has a unified user information, suitable for a variety of applications, not limited to the development language.Customers can choose their favorite development method, and one process can quickly use our school system.
info.subTitle3Info: Provide the most secure authorization code mode, the simplest password mode and the most convenient verification code mode.
info.developmentTitle: Provide complete access documentation for developers
info.developmentInfo: The development language is not limited, and the http-based authorization model allows developers to choose the technology stack freely.

tip.delete: Are you sure to delete this data?
tip.dangerDelete: Dangerous operation: Are you sure to delete this data?

login.fail: Login Failed. Seems like something went wrong, please return and try.
login.again: Waiting too long? Click me back to try again
login.error: You are not logged in, please try after login.

logout.fail: Logout Failed. Seems like something went wrong, please return and try.
logout.again: Waiting too long? Click me back to try again

error.400: Request error: Access denied due to invalid request body.
error.401: Unauthorized: Access denied due to invalid credentials.
error.403: Authentication failed: you do not have permission to access the resource.
error.404: Resource not found: Cannot find information about the resource you are accessing.
error.405: Invalid operation: method is not supported.
error.500: Service error: An internal error occurred on the server, please contact the administrator.
error.action: Oh My God, there was a small error. Please try later.

validate.complete: Please confirm that you have completed the correct information
validate.max: The value must be greater than {0}.
validate.min: The value must be less than {0}.
validate.maxLength: The length must be less than {0}.
validate.minLength: The length must be greater than {0}.
validate.rangeLength: The length must be in the range of {0} to {1}.
validate.resume: The resume length must be less than 4000. Now it is {0}.

role.edit: Click on the field to edit.

res.empty: Please select a data to view the information.
res.info: There are three parts: permission resources, menu resources, and routing resources. Non-developers should not modify them easily.

tip.name: Your real name, not as a login account.

tip.originalMajor: If the last degree is a high school, you do not need to fill in; if the last degree is a college, you need to fill in.
